reviewText: Great thrills and suspense!  Grisham is a fun ride for mysteries!  The actors are all our favorites and there is action.  The endings of Grisham stories are often unrealistic, but the story is always interesting and intelligent.

reviewText: I don't usually see movies of books I have read but this collection is great.  The acting is real. The adaptation is very good. I can watch my favorite author's words come alive on the screen over and over.  Five stars are not enough.

reviewText: I'll keep it short and sweet: great movies, at a great price. If you love the writing of John Grisham, or simply enough a good mystery or drama, check this collection out. Some of the movies are a bit dated, as they were filmed more than 15 years ago, but if you don't care or even want to go back in time for a few hours, this is a very good collection of films to do it with. :)
summary: If you love a good "who dun it" this is a great collection at a great price

reviewText: Shared this with Criminal Justice students.  They were able to connect some of the drama into the dry criminal procedures of the textbook.  These seemed to put some life into the "never do these things" when preparing or presenting a case to the jury that the text rambles on about.

reviewText: You can't go wrong purchasing this group of DVD's.  Each story is interesting and far apart from each other.  You get a good spectrum of totally different circumstances.  Highly recommend adding to your collection.
